name: Kim Possible: Legend of the Monkey's Eye
name_original: Kim Possible: Legend of the Monkey's Eye
description: Monkey Fist has discovered the most potent mystic monkey power of all the Monkeys Eye. With the force of the Monkeys Eye, Monkey Fist is plotting to create an evil ape empire by transforming every human into a monkey. Players control Kim, in battles against the evil villain, Monkey Fist, including three boss battles. Players must defeat Monkey Fist and save the world. Players kick, punch, and jump their way through six different levels battling Monkey Ninjas and Mecha-Monkeys in three unique locations to crush Monkey Fist's attempt at world domination. Players power-up by picking up teleporter mini-cells, static shields, Bueno Nacho Tacos, and teleporter power cores to gain strength over enemies and secure access to new areas. The goal is to defeat Monkey Fist and steal back the Monkeys Eye to save mankind.
